fields.hero_text: Neurologic Music Therapy Services of Arizona
fields.body: Neurologic Music Therapy Services of Arizonaâ€™s (NMTSA) vision is to unleash the unique potential of individuals with disabilities. NMTSA has provided services to persons with neurologic impairments/differences (ages 18 months to 90+ years of age) and their families in the greater Phoenix area since 1982.
